description:
Maxim is the guy who was dressed in knight`s armor and died in the crypt along with Millie Marl.
He is the original Kuiaran according to Victorique.
He was a graduate of the academy who returns to the school every spring to hide the stolen treasures there.
It looks like he knew Millie Marl and perhaps he could have been one of the reason of the girl`s death.
name: Maxim
